solution_line_template: Each boat will require {boat_width} feet across to fit itself and {space_per_side} feet space on one side for a total of {space_per_side}+{boat_width} = <<{boat_width}+{space_per_side}={feet_per_boat}>>{feet_per_boat} feet per boat

The last boat will need an additional {space_per_side} feet space on its other side, so this {space_per_side} feet should be subtracted first from the {river_width} feet which leaves {river_width}-{space_per_side} = <<{river_width}-{space_per_side}={remaining_river_width}>>{remaining_river_width} feet

{feet_per_boat} feet per boat on the remaining {remaining_river_width} feet for a total of {remaining_river_width}/{feet_per_boat} = <<{remaining_river_width}/{feet_per_boat}={num_boats}>>{num_boats} boats
